name: Lujei
content: Lujei was a female Human who lived on the planet Cularin during the waning years of the Galactic Republic, working in the resort city Rorkee. In circa 31 BBY, Lujei greeted the Heroes of Cularin, a group of freelance agents who had traveled to Rorkee, and she proceeded to give them a tour of the Sanads of Rorkee, a luxury hotel that the agents were to stay at.
